description.de:
Minjoo wird als Schurkin Dahlia Margaret in einem Fantasyroman wiedergeboren und ist niedergeschmettert von der Tatsache, dass ihr ein früher Tod bevorsteht. Aber wenigstens ist sie Sooyeon, der Tyrannin ihrer Highschool entkommen. Oder? Als Dahlia auf Flore trifft, ihre jüngere Schwester und Gegenspielerin im Buch, wird ihr klar, dass es sich dabei um niemand Geringeren handelt als ihre ehemalige Peinigerin. Getrieben von dem Wunsch zu überleben und am besten gleich Rache zu nehmen, ist Dahlia nun auf der Suche nach mächtigen Verbündeten. Ein gut aussehender Adeliger scheint ein geeigneter Kandidat zu sein. Aber wird ein Deal mit dem mysteriösen Mann Dahlia wirklich helfen, ihre Ziele zu erreichen? Oder erwarten sie unangenehme Überraschungen?

---

description.en:
Reborn into a fantasy novel as a wicked character fated to meet an early demise, Minjoo - now Dahlia Margaret - has a lot on her plate right from the start. But at least she’s now free of her vicious high school bully, Sooyeon. Or is she? When Dahlia meets Flore, her estranged sister and the protagonist of the novel, she is shocked to find that the girl bears a suspicious resemblance to the classmate who tormented her. Now, driven by the desire to save her own life and also get revenge, Dahlia needs to make a powerful ally, and she has her eye on a handsome royal who just might be perfect for the job. However, a deal with this mysterious man might mean more than she bargained for…

---
I wasn't able to overcome the harassment and took my life, but I was reincarnated with the perpetrator? The perpetrator is the heroine, Florre, and I am the villainess, Dahlia, who's going to die horribly.

"They said you are a villain with neither blood nor tears, but unlike the rumors, you often shed tears."

"Your Highness must believe all the nonsense the idiots are talking about, huh?"

Grand Duke of Cervian, the half brother of the male lead and who will be punished for treason afterwards. He approached me. I can't lose the man who will be my greatest ally.

"Your Highness, would you marry me?"

"Now… what did you say?"

"And take revenge together."

A similar situation, a fixed ending. The heroine is not the only one who knows the ending of the novel. I took a long and arduous path of revenge.

---

description.es:
Minjoo sufría el bullying constante de Sooyeon, pero todo cambia cuando las estudiantes que se odiaban a muerte terminan reencarnando en una novela: Sooyeon aparece en el cuerpo de Flore, la heroína, y Minjoo reencarna en el personaje de Dalia, la villana. Minjoo quiere vengarse de su acosadora, pero para eso debe elaborar un plan y aliarse con el archiduque Yohan. La venganza es un plato que se sirve frío…

description.fr:
Minjoo ne s'attendait pas à terminer dans le corps de Dahlia Margaret, un personnage de roman qu'elle connaît bien. Un destin plutôt agréable et qui rattrape celui de sa vie passée, dans laquelle elle subissait solitude et harcèlement. Ou du moins c'est ce qu'elle pensait, jusqu'à ce que Flore, sa sœur fictive fasse son apparition et que Minjoo se rende compte qu'elle ressemble très étrangement à la camarade de classe qui la persécutait. Afin de garder une vie agréable, mais également de se venger, elle a donc besoin d'un allié puissant, et quoi de mieux que le séduisant Grand duc, Johan, pour remplir ce rôle? Seulement, il se pourrait bien que cette alliance avec ce mystérieux jeune homme lui réserve bien des surprises...

description.id:
Aku bereinkarnasi ke dalam sebuah novel yang kubaca bersama si penganiaya yang telah menjerumuskanku ke neraka. Si penganiaya itu menjadi 'Florre' yang merupakan tokoh utama dalam novel, sedangkan aku menjadi antagonis yang akan mati secara mengenaskan bernama 'Dahlia'.

Aku, Dahlia yang merupakan antagonis berencana untuk membalaskan dendamku pada Florre sang tokoh utama yang telah dimasuki oleh si penganiaya diriku di dunia sebelumnya, yaitu Lee Suyeon. Aku menyiapkan rencana dan menjalankan semuanya demi itu.

"Yang Mulia Grand Duke, maukah anda menikah dengan saya?"
"Apa... yang baru saja anda katakan?"
"Lalu, mari kita balaskan dendam kita bersama."

Yohan Descartes Servien, kakak tiri dari tokoh pria utama, Noel yang ditakdirkan untuk dihukum setelah melakukan pengkhianatan.
Aku tidak boleh melewatkan pria yang akan menjadi sekutu terbaikku ini.

Karena aku sudah bereinkarnasi ke dalam tubuh ini, aku akan memanfaatkannya dengan baik.
Lee Suyeon, rasakanlah juga rasanya terjerumus ke dalam neraka.

description.ko:
내게 지옥을 선사한 가해자와 함께 읽었던 소설에 빙의해버렸다. 가해자는 여주인공인 '플로레'로, 나는 끔찍하게 죽게 될 악녀 '달리아'로. "대공 전하, 저와 결혼하시지 않으시겠어요?" "지금… 뭐라고 하셨습니까?" "그리고 함께 복수해요." 남주인공인 노엘의 이복 형이자 이후 반역을 일으켜 처단될, 운명인 요한 데카르트 세르비엔. 내 복수의 최고의 아군이 될 남자를 놓쳐서는 안 된다. 악녀의 몸에 빙의한 이상, 이 몸을 철저하게 사용해주겠어. 이수연, 너도 지옥 속으로 빠져봐.

description.zh-hk:
因無法忍受霸凌而自殺後，竟然和加害者一起進入了小說！加害者變成女主角佩洛蕾，而我變成最後會悲慘死去的惡女妲莉雅。我拉攏了男主角同父異母的哥哥，也就是將在日後發起叛變的約翰·塞爾維安大公，他會是我最可靠的援軍。相似的處境、既定的結局，知道小說結局的人可不只有女主角，我選擇了漫長又辛苦的復仇之路。

description.en:
Enemy creatures that must be defeated are "Emotional Deviants,'' also known as "craters.'' In addition, the disasters caused by these are called "Storms.'' Nagi a lonely high school boy has started to feel that something is off recently, unknown memories began seeping into his mind. And then there is this strange girl he encountered. Everything culminates when his landlady turns into a monster in front of him and a strange power awakes in him. Is he a human or a Craters himself?  
A new era of psychic battle action where “emotions” shake the world!!

altTitles.ja: 複雑な姉弟の４コマ

altTitles.ja-ro: Fukuzatsu na Kyoudai no Yonkoma

altTitles.en: A Complicated Older Sister and Younger Brother 4-Koma

description.en:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: Kadokawa)

「姉ちゃん!?」
「康太!?」

＊

ゲーム内で恋愛を楽しんでいたふたり。
待ちに待ったオフ会で顔を合わせたら……相手はまさかの姉弟で!?
複雑なこの感情……なかなか飲み込むのは難しい！

ＳＮＳで話題のカオス展開ラブコメが、 描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化!!

description.en:
Takamine Takane is the goddess of her high school. With perfect grades, athletic prowess, and unrivaled beauty, this student council president sits at the top of the social pyramid. And then there's Shirota Koushi, a below-average student with no friends or social prospects to speak of. One day, Shirota-kun accidentally sees Takamine-san's naked breasts and finds out the secret behind her unbelievable success. From then on, his school life changes.

“Become my closet!”

Shirota is forced into underwear-putting-on servitude!?
___
[Alt Official English (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/please-put-them-on-takamine-san)
description.ru:
Президент студсовета, Такамине-сан находится на самом верху школьной иерархии. Она — практически бог!  
Однажды Широта-кун случайно увидел обнажённую грудь Такамине. С того момента его школьная жизнь изменилась.  
- "Надень мои трусики для меня"   
В итоге Широта-кун оказался в стеснительном положении из-за розовых пристрастий Такамине-сан.

description.pt-br:
A presidente do conselho estudantil, Takamine-san, está no topo da hierarquia escolar, uma deusa! Um dia, Shirota-kun acidentalmente vê os seios nus de Takamine-san. A partir de então, sua vida escolar mudou, sendo chantageado para uma vida de servidão a Takamine-san. ― “Coloque minha calcinha para mim”
Shirota-kun acabou em uma situação difícil devido aos favores cor-de-rosa de Takamine-san.

altTitles.en: The Stain of the Trapped Beast

description.en: Once a prince of a fallen nation, but due to the defeat in war, he could only be reduced as a prisoner and become plaything for the powerful people of the victorious nation. Xing Mu, who endured the humiliation and disguised himself as an Omega, was on a mission of revenge and restoration of his homeland. However, his biggest obstacle was the helpless second prince of the enemy nation — a beautiful omega who was marked by him in an accident. Therefore, the love and hate between the two, accompanied by the dark surge of revenge, tightly entangled together...
description.pl: Kiedyś należał do rodziny królewskiej, lecz jego kraj poniósł solidną porażkę. Mógł tylko zostać jeńcem dla potężnych ludzi zwycięskiego kraju, aby mogli się zabawić jego kosztem. Xing Mu, mimo iż czuł upokorzenie, przebrał się za Omegę, by móc się zemścić i odbudować swój kraj. Jednakże... Najważniejszą przeszkodą, jaką musiał pokonać, był drugi książę wroga, Hill, którego przez przypadek oznaczył, czyniąc z niego jego Omegę. W tym momencie miłość i nienawiść między dwojgiem ludzi są ściśle splecione z nurtem zemsty....

description.en:
Love, friendship, and the sparkling joys of youth. The high school life that I’ve looked forward to—still ended with me being alone. Then, just a day before the graduation ceremony...

*“Don’t die! Nanamura-kun!”*

Sora Hanamitsuji, she’s a beautiful girl that even models can’t compare to. My life ended after getting hit by a truck to protect her. That should’ve been the case.

However, with this accident, Hanamitsuji-san and I returned to the day of our high school’s entrance ceremony. The second high school life is no longer as charming and youthful. I was going to spend it modestly and alone. But, she said that won’t do.

*“Well, I’ll help you make friends.”*

This is a story about my second high school life. It’s the worst and best teenage rom-com ever.
description.ja:
恋、友情、輝かしい青春。そんな期待に胸を膨らませた俺の高校生活は――結局ぼっちのまま終わった。そして迎えた卒業式前日。クラスメイトの花見辻空をかばい、俺はトラックに轢かれて人生の幕を閉じた……はずだった。
花見辻と一緒に高校一年生の入学式に戻ってしまった俺。二度目の高校生活は輝かしい青春など期待せず大人しくぼっちで過ごそうと思いきや……。
「ぼっち脱却、私が手伝ってあげる」
この物語は俺が二度目の高校生活で送る、最悪で最高の青春ラブコメだ。GA文庫の大人気作、待望のコミカライズ!

description.en:
"Is this what it feels like to fall in love at first sight?" 
While visiting a friend at the Eunseong College of Engineering, Hansol falls in love with Minjun at first sight. Minjun is a professor of architecture at the university, and is infamous for being a huge brat...
I, Lee Hansol, won't back down so easily. Baek Minjun, I will make you mine!

description.en: The highly-acclaimed fifth arc of Hirohiko Araki’s JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure shifts the action from Japan to Italy, as Koichi Hirose heads to Europe to find an aspiring gangster named Giorno Giovanna, the secret son of Dio Brando, scourge of the Joestar family. Organized crime meets family drama and unbelievable enemy Stands in JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: Part 5—Golden Wind!
description.it:
Napoli, 2001. Giorno Giovana è un piccolo criminale con il grande sogno di diventare una "Gang-Star". Giorno ha una connessione con la linea sanguigna Joestar, e possiede lo stand "Gold Experience". Il suo sogno inizia a diventare realtà quando incontra Bruno Bucciarati, un partecipante della gang "Passione" e un portatore di stand. Giunti alla conclusione che tutti e due hanno idee simili, e che unanimamente non concordano sugli affari della gang, Giorno rivela il suo obiettivo: con l'aiuto di Bruno, riformerà Passione spodestando il capo della gang.

Giorno, una volta diventato membro di Passione ed entrato nella squadra di Bucciarati, scopre che non è una semplice gang, è piena di portatori di stand. Una volta confrontatesi con le altre squadre, sleali e imprevedibili, scoprono che il loro obiettivo di cambiare la gang dall'interno non sarà facile da raggiungere. Parlando a proposito di questi avversari, Gioeno tenta di ralire tra i ranghi per avvicinarsi al boss, un uomo circondato dal mistero.

description.en:
Youour Highness- That is absurd!!

"Youour Highness, did you just cough-!!!"

"It's doomed! I've been transmigrated to another world! As an extra chambermaid from a 19+ imperovished novel from the early 2000s!"

For now, I'm trying my best not to upset the male lead's temper so I can survive and return home...

"Youour Highness! Please have mercy!"
"Youour Highness! That is such an absurd thing to say!"
"Could you please stop with that damn antiquated language?!"
Seems like the etiquette here is a bit different from what I know...

Anyway, after defeating an assassin and taking an arrow for him, I feel like I've become somewhat closer to the male lead.

The ominous journal that seems to understand my words, and the male lead, who orders me around, seems a bit fishy too.

"Can I survive here and return home?"
A gorgeous Omega transmigrated into a normal society, and he collapsed on the street after getting intoxicated by the pheromone he released.
description.zh: 貌美omega一朝穿越进正常社会，竟因自己释放的信息素醉倒在街头。

description.en: His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student.  Furious, Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly, during their interactions with each other, Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...

description.en:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri is a man playing the role of the perfect student council president, with his good looks and excellent grades in both school and sports. After school, he witnesses his usually quiet female classmate Sado Mitsuki, tormenting their teacher Tamura in a very sadistic way! The perfect student council president gets caught up in Sado-san's secret fetish!

This is an unusual romantic comedy for those of you who have things you can't tell others!
description.ja: 文武両道、容姿端麗、パーフェクトな生徒会長を演じ切る男、土御門聖。そんな聖が放課後に見てしまったのは、いつもはおとなしいクラスメイト・佐渡さんがドSに教師をいじめる姿だった――！佐渡の秘められし性癖に、完璧な生徒会長が巻き込まれていく…！人には言えないコトがあるアナタに贈る、異色ラブコメ！
description.es-la:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri es un hombre que desempeña el papel del perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil, con su buena apariencia y excelentes calificaciones tanto en la escuela como en los deportes.  Después de la escuela, es testigo de cómo su normalmente tranquila compañera de clase, Sado Mitsuki, atormenta a su maestro Tamura de una manera muy sádica.  ¡El perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil queda atrapado en el fetiche secreto de Sado-san!

 ¡Esta es una comedia romántica inusual para aquellos que tienen cosas que no pueden contarles a los demás!

description.en: Choi Seon Ha, the top-selling employee at the men's maid cafe 'Moe.' One day, while smoking in the staff-only area, he is illegally filmed. Police aspirant Eun Geon, who works part-time at a nearby convenience store, witnesses the incident by chance and, unable to stand by in the face of injustice, helps Seon Ha out of simple goodwill. In return, Seon Ha invites Eun Geon to the maid cafe where he works, but Eun Geon refuses. After that, Seon Ha visits the convenience store every day, trying to cross the line Eun Geon has drawn, and Eun Geon finds it increasingly difficult to turn away the persistent Seon Ha....

description.en:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
description.fr:
**Je fais des choses tellement horribles à mes Magical Girls préférées !**

Moi, c’est Utena Hiiragi, et comme toutes les filles de mon âge, j’adore les magical girls !
Un jour, une étrange créature aux allures de mascotte m’a lancé un sort, et je suis devenue capable de me transformer, moi aussi !
Je vais pouvoir me battre aux côtés de mes héroïnes préférées !
Enfin, c’est ce que je croyais…

C’est quoi, cette tenue scandaleuse ?
Et comment ça, je suis au service du Mal ?!

Mais qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ?!

**La comédie BDSM dans laquelle s’affrontent des Magical Girls !!**

**Avec ses personnages tous plus fous les uns que les autres, Looking Up to Magical Girls balaye les genres et nous place du côté du mal ! Akihiro Ononaka déploie tout l’arsenal BDSM à sa disposition pour nous proposer un concentré d’humour légèrement sexy et complètement déjanté !**

---
**Links:**
- [Official French](https://www.amazon.fr/Looking-up-Magical-Girls-1/dp/2382750731/)
description.uk: Хііраґі Утена завжди захоплювалася чарівними дівчатами і мріяла перетворитися на круту героїню, яка бореться зі злом. Тож, коли одного вечора до неї підходить талісман, яка стверджує, що в ній дрімає магічна сила, вона тремтить від хвилювання. Але її барвиста мрія швидко розбивається об іронічний поворот подій, коли вона перетворюється на лиходійку!
description.es-la:
Hiiragi Utena, una chica que ama a las Chicas Mágicas, vive su vida cotidiana y desea ser como ellas.
Un día aparece un personaje curioso frente a ella y le ofrece el poder de hacer realidad sus deseos, pero...
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, ¡comienza la feroz batalla!
description.pt-br: Hiiragi Utena é uma garota apaixonada por Mahou Shoujo que sonhava em se tornar uma delas e poder lutar ao lado de sua heroína favorita. Certo dia, um mascote inesperadamente apareceu ao seu lado e lançou uma feitiço em Hiiragi, oferecendo a ela a oportunidade de estar de frente para sua ídolo. Entretanto, diferente do que ela esperava, a transformação a fez virar uma vilã ao invés de uma mahou shoujo. Para piorar, a mudança faz com que ela deixe de ser uma tímida garota e passe a ser uma dominatrix sádica. Agora Hiiragi precisará lidar com sua nova “profissão”, ao mesmo tempo que tenta aproveitar os momentos ao lado de sua heroína, por mais que seja para tentar torturá-la.

description.en:
Cheon Seju, had no choice but to join an organization to avenge his dead sister. After losing all hope in life, he meets a boy who reminds him of his sister and offers him a small act of kindness. 

If I had known that my light heart would become so heavy, I wouldn't have brought you with me.



"I told you, you'll always come first......." 

His gaze usually fierce gaze was different today. 
Cheon Seju's gaze was gentle, sweet and persistent.

"So take responsibility".

Cheon Seju was my first everything. He was the first person to ever reach out a hand to me, and gaze upon me. Sejin only accepted the man's hand because he offered it first and he only ever gazed upon him because he gazed upon him first. And that is how he fell in love with this sweet and affectionate man.

Sejin realized that he no longer wanted to be separated from Cheon Seju.
Where ever he goes, I'll go. 

"You are all I have left now......."

description.en:
A series about the lives of two high school girls living in Tokyo after aliens have invaded. Dead Dead Demon's Dededededestruction is a self-styled dystopian slice-of-life that reflects on modern societal and political issues in Japan while still maintaining a sense of humor and frivolity.

Large mysterious alien ships have been looming above Japanese towns for three years, filling the sky. Everything changed three years ago. And yet, nothing has changed.

No weapon used against the invaders' ships had any success, beyond destroying part of Japan and leaving its economy in shambles. JSDF is fighting a guerrilla battle against the aliens all over Japan. America is joining the 'war' effort with more aggressive tactics, dividing Japan over the pacifist principle laid out in Article 9 of the Japanese constitution. But this may just be the mundane story of young high schoolers.

"No matter what happens, I won't back down. At least not until this world filled with lies and deceit crumbles away. The real threat to humankind is not invaders, but me."

---
- **Won the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga** 
- **Won the 25th Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Award in 2022**
description.fr:
Depuis 3 ans, le ciel de Tokyo est recouvert par un gigantesque vaisseau spatial extra-terrestre. Pourtant, aucune attaque de la part des extra-terrestres n’est recensée, bien que les humains abattent, avec une facilité déconcertante, les petits vaisseaux qui sortent de temps en temps du ventre de l’immense engin…

Pendant ce temps, sur Terre, les deux amies Kadode et Ôran, comme la majorité des humains, ne prêtent plus attention à ce vaisseau et continuent à vivre leur vie. Mais ces 3 années de paix ont endormi la vigilance de l’Humanité… Elle ne remarque pas que « l’envahisseur » s’est infiltré au sein de sa population. Et il pourrait bientôt troubler leur paisible quotidien !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**

"Very good. I shall give you my beloved sister, whom I cherish dearly."

Eric Chladnie, who led the long war to victory against the Shidate Principality, received the mandate to marry a foolish princess as a reward for his triumph.

After the wedding ceremony, Eric returned to the mansion with the newlywed princess. Amidst the princess's eccentric behaviour, his father attempts to kill her and his mother advices him to not give his heart. Only he, treating her like a child, respects and cherishes her as his wife. However, who is this woman who, in front of the king, impersonates deeds that she has never done and acts piously?

description.en:
My name is Rosaria von Valencia, but I didn't always have this name. According to a book I read, I'm supposed to be murdered in place of the saint, Cordelia, just because I look like her. I decided to run away to avoid ever meeting my future killer, Duke Valencia, but ended up running into him as he was on the brink of death. After I saved him in the hopes of being spared, he adopted me as his daughter! Now that my new dad's spoiling me with love, does this mean I'll get to live until the end?

---
It's already unfair that I suffered greatly because I closely resembled the saint, but why did the villain kill me without any mercy at all? No, actually, it said in the book that I was really bound to die. 'My life is already ruined. Of all things, why do I have to be the one to die a ridiculous death?' There's still hope! I haven't met any of the characters yet so I'll just run away! But why did the villain collapse in front of me...?

With a lot of effort, I barely saved the life of the villain who was on the brink of death. But now he's saying that he wanted to adopt me as his daughter and raise me to be a saint?! Just like that, I decided to become his daughter for a few days before leaving quietly.

"My daughter is a genius. There's no child who is more angelic in this world other than my daughter."

...I think I have coaxed my dad too well. Even the guys who originally followed the real saint started to pay attention to me. What went wrong? Aren't you guys supposed to hate me?!

---

description.es:
Ya es injusto que sufrí mucho porque me parezco mucho a la Santa, pero ¿por qué el villano me mató sin piedad?No, en realidad, decía en el libro que estaba destinado a morir.'Mi vida ya está arruinada. De todas las cosas, ¿por qué tengo que ser yo quien tenga una muerte ridícula?¡Todavía hay esperanza! Todavía no he conocido a ninguno de los personajes, ¡así que me escaparé!Pero, ¿por qué el villano colapsó frente a mí...?Con mucho esfuerzo, apenas salvé la vida del villano que estaba al borde de la muerte.¡¿Pero ahora dice que quería adoptarme como su hija y criarme para ser una Santa?!Así como así, decidí convertirme en su hija por unos días antes de irme en silencio.—Mi hija es un genio. No hay niña más angelical en este mundo que mi hija.…Creo que he engatusado a mi padre demasiado bien.Incluso los chicos que originalmente seguían a la verdadera Santa empezaron a prestarme atención.¿Qué salió mal? ¡¿No se supone que ustedes me odian?!

Namaku Cordelia, sama seperti nama saintess yang parasnya juga mirip sekali denganku. Menurut buku yang aku baca, di masa depan nanti aku akan mati di tangan seorang duke yang salah mengiraku sebagai saintess. Aku bermaksud untuk kabur dari takdir itu, tapi aku malah bertemu dengan sang duke jahat dan dia mengangkatku sebagai anaknya! "Tidak masalah kan kalau aku jadi anak angkatnya sebentar?" Apakah aku akan bernasib sama isi buku itu? Omong-omong, aku baca di mana ya buku itu?

description.ko:
성녀와 닮았다는 이유로 납치당한 것도 억울한데
악당은 가차 없이 나를 죽였다.

아니, 그렇게 죽을 거라고 책에 쓰여 있었다.

‘이번 생은 망했어. 하필이면 어이없이 죽는 역할이야?’

아직 희망은 있었다.
등장인물들과 아무도 만나지 않은 지금, 도망쳐야 한다!
그런데 왜 악당이 내 앞에 쓰러져 있지……?

죽을 고비에서 겨우 악당을 구했더니
이젠 그가 성녀가 될 재목이라며 나를 딸로 입양했다?!
기왕 이렇게 된 거, 며칠 딸 노릇 하다가 조용히 떠나려고 했는데

“내 딸은 천재다. 내 딸처럼 천사 같은 아이는 이 세상에 없지.”

……아빠를 너무 잘 꼬셔 버린 것 같다.

심지어 진짜 성녀를 따라다니던 남자들도 내게 관심을 갖기 시작했다.

왜 이래? 나 너희들 싫거든?!

description.sk:
Volám sa Rosaria von Valencia, ale nie vždy som sa tak volala. Podľa knihy, ktorú som čítala, ma mali zavraždiť namiesto svätice Cordelie len preto, že sa na ňu podobám. Rozhodla som sa utiecť, aby som sa nikdy nestretla so svojím budúcim vrahom, vojvodom Valenciom, ale nakoniec som naňho narazila, keď bol na pokraji smrti. Po tom, čo som ho zachránila v nádeji, že ma v budúcnosti ušetrí, si ma adoptoval za svoju dcéru! Teraz, keď ma môj nový otec rozmaznáva láskou, znamená to, že budem žiť až do konca?

description.vi:
Vì gần giống với Thánh nữ mà chịu nhiều đau khổ, đã là rất bất công rồi, nhưng sao nhân vật phản diện lại xuống tay với mình không một chút thương sót chứ?

Không, thật ra, ở trong sách, mình sẽ chết như vậy.

“Cuộc đời mình bị huỷ hoại cả rồi. Sau tất cả, sao mình lại phải chịu một cái chết lố bịch như vậy chứ?”

Mình vẫn còn cơ hội! Mình vẫn chưa chạm mặt bất kì nhân vật nào nên mình sẽ bỏ chạy!

Nhưng sao nhân vật phản diện lại đổ gục trước mắt mình…?

Mình đã rất cố gắng để cứu sống nhân vật phản diện đang cận kề cái chết.

Nhưng anh ta nói muốn nhận mình làm con gái và nuôi dạy mình trở thành Thánh nữ?!

Và như thế, mình đồng ý trở thành con gái của anh ta vài ngày trước khi lẳng lặng rời đi.

“Con gái ta là thiên tài. Không có đứa trẻ nào trên thế giới này hơn được con gái ta đâu.”…Mình nghĩ mình nịnh cha rất tốt đó.

Ngay cả những người lúc đầu đi theo vị Thánh nữ thật cũng bắt đầu để ý đến mình.

Chuyện gì đây? Chẳng phải họ ghét mình á?

description.en: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.

description.en:
After having descended upon this world, the gods have created guilds where adventurers can test their mettle. These guilds, known as "familia," grant adventurers the chance to explore, gather, hunt, or simply enjoy themselves.  
Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka Gaiden: Sword Oratoria begins in Orario, the lively city of adventurers. The Sword Princess, Ais Wallenstein, and the novice mage, Lefiya Viridis, are members of the Loki Familia, who are experts at monster hunting. With the rest of their group, they journey to the tower of Babel in hopes of exploring the dungeon underneath. Home to powerful monsters, the dungeon will fulfill Ais's desire to master her sword skills, while bringing Lefiya closer to her dream of succeeding Riveria Ljos Alf, vice-captain of the Loki Familia, as the most powerful mage in the land.

description.en:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.

Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his father’s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.

This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.

description.en:
Bell Cranel is just trying to find his way in the world. Of course, in his case, the “world” is an enormous dungeon filled with monsters below a city run by gods and goddesses with way too much time on their hands. He’s got big dreams but not much more when a roll on the random encounter die brings him face-to-face with the girl of his dreams—but what’s an amateur adventurer got to offer a brilliant swords woman? And what if the lonely goddess who sponsors his solo adventuring gets jealous?

(Series was cancelled in 2018 for an unknown reason and restarted in 2020 under a sequel title.)
description.ru: Огромный город Орарио - всего лишь вход в подземный лабиринт, широко известный как "Подземелье". Люди приходят туда за славой, честью, приходят, надеясь получить все то, что захотят. И именно здесь парень, мечтающий стать авантюристом, знакомится с маленькой богиней, не нашедшей ни одного последователя.

description.en:
Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)
description.pt-br: Bai Lijin, uma fada que vivia no céu, comendo e bebendo sem se preocupar, quebrou o colorido vitral de Sua Majestade em seu aniversário e foi banida para o reino mortal. Agora ela tem que começar suas aventuras no reino mortal sem todos os seus poderes espirituais! Para sobreviver, a ex-fada tem que entregar comida… Uma fada carinhosamente boba, uma gentil gerente de restaurante, uma aluna reservada e uma garota de duas caras difícil de resistir, que comece a história de sua bela amizade e juventude!

description.en:
'You’re its prey the moment you touch it.' One day, suddenly, a terrible virus variant attacks Seoul! 

Yeon-woo is on a school trip to Seoul, and is excited thinking that he can finally get along with his one classmate, So-yeon, whom he has a crush on.

However, during this time, unidentified cells appeared in front of Yeon-woo’s class, who were sightseeing in Seoul. The mutant cells manifestation quickly turns Yeon-woo and his classmates’ school trip into hell as anyone who comes into contact with the cells will become a hideous monster that wants to consume anything with flesh...! 

Will Yeon-woo be able to leave Seoul safely?
description.pt-br: Yeon Woo está apaixonado. Ele não tem olhos pra mais nada além da So Yeon. Na escola ele não conseguiu falar com ela, mas agora que eles estão indo pra uma excursão escolar em Seoul, ele tem esperança de conseguir pelo menos começar a conversar com ela, mesmo apesar de ser muito introvertido. Porém, tem coisas estranhas acontecendo em Seoul… Algo terrível está prestes a dominar a cidade… Nesse dia, Seoul de repente é…?

altTitles.ja: 大人になれない僕らは

altTitles.es-la: Nosotros que no podemos convertirnos en adultos

description.en:
The latest work from the author of "The Diary of a Commuting Student". It's a silly and endless story about how some kids kill time by repeating the 7th of July every day. A time-loop love story of two high school students trapped in "Eternal Youth"!

(Source: Young Magazine)
description.es-la: ¡El último trabajo de Jo Fujita en Commuting Student Diary! Esta es nuestra tonta e interminable historia de cómo matamos el tiempo una y otra vez el 7 de julio. ¡Una historia de amor en bucle temporal de dos estudiantes de preparatoria atrapados en una "eterna juventud"!

title.en: Boku wa Kimitachi wo Shihai suru

altTitles.ja: 僕は君たちを支配する

altTitles.zh-hk: 我將要支配你們的一切

description.en:
Seven women, one man, a suspenseful harem story!

During a class reunion, the school became an enclosed dimension without warning. Yelling and screaming brought no response. 26-year old unemployed Haruka Sato has to survive by cooperating with seven of his former classmates. Soon, the extreme conditions began to eat away at their sanity, and Haruka's hidden desires began to take hold.
description.ru:
Семь женщин и один мужчина - захватывающая история о гареме!

Во время встречи выпускников школа неожиданно превратилась в замкнутое пространство. Крики и вопли ни к чему не привели. 26-летнему безработному Харуке Сато приходится выживать, сотрудничая с семью своими бывшими одноклассниками. Вскоре экстремальные условия начали разъедать их рассудок, и скрытые желания Харуки начали овладевать ими.

---

(Source: [mangalib](https://mangalib.me/boku-wa-kimitachi-wo-shihai-suru?section=info))
description.vi:
Bảy nữ, một nam, câu chuyện hậu cung hồi hộp!
Trong một buổi họp lớp, trường học bỗng nhiên bị một bức tường kỳ lạ bao quanh, không ai có thể thoát ra được. Haruka Sato 26 tuổi thất nghiệp phải sống sót bằng cách hợp tác với bảy người bạn học cũ của mình. Cuối cùng, hoàn cảnh khắc nghiệt bắt đầu ăn mòn tâm trí của họ, và dục vọng thầm kín của Haruka đã lộ ra nanh vuốt
description.es-la: ¡Siete mujeres, un hombre, una historia de harén llena de suspenso! Durante una reunión de ex-alumnos, la escuela se convirtió en una dimensión cerrada sin previo aviso. Los gritos y chillidos no trajeron respuesta. Haruka Sato, desempleado de 26 años, tiene que sobrevivir cooperando con siete de sus antiguas compañeras de clase. Pronto, las condiciones extremas comenzaron a devorar su cordura, y los deseos ocultos de Haruka comenzaron a afianzarse.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kiss Shicha Dame Nano?

altTitles.ja: キスしちゃダメなの？

description.en:
Tarou, an ultra-pure virgin who has a complex with red hair and freckles, he feels a sense of closeness to Rui, a transfer student who, like himself, is "half but not good at English", and becomes friends with him.

However, the physical contact from Rui is so excessive and sweet that it surpasses Tarou's idea of ​​"friends", and it keeps making his heart beat faster every day...!

Friends, is it okay to kiss...!? Is this love!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Hyōka

altTitles.th: ปริศนาความทรงจำ

altTitles.ja: 氷菓

description.en:
Oreki Houtarou is an "energy-saver" kind of guy, who expends as little energy as possible to do only things he has to. When he starts high school, his older sister sends him a letter asking him to join the Classics Club. The club meant a lot to her, and its number of members has been reduced to zero.  
  
Houtarou reluctantly signs up for the club, only to find that someone else has joined, too! She's Chitanda Eru, a cute, big-eyed girl with an overwhelming sense of curiosity. A mystery crops up that catches Eru's interest, and also draws in Houtarou's friend, Fukube Satoshi. They continue solving mundane mysteries together, and soon they draw in Satoshi and Houtarou's friend, Ibara Mayaka, as well. Mayaka has had a blatant crush on Satoshi since middle school, but he always fends off her advances. Together, they search for the truth in a mystery that involves the history of the Classics Club.
description.ru: В центре данной истории - литературный клуб в одной школе. Члены этого клуба не просто читают книжки, а пытаются всеми силами раскрыть преступление, которое было совершено 33 года назад. И в этот клуб поступает главный герой по имени Хотаро, хотя поступает он не по собственному желанию, а из-за приказа своей старшей сестры…

altTitles.ja: 花鳥風月

description.en:
Itokawa is moving out to his deceased grandfather's house in the remote countryside. Although he was told that the house had been kept up after his grandfather passed away, he is in for a rude awakening when he gets there. He meets a bunch of interesting people who live in the small town…  
  
After Sawato's grandmother passes away, he succeeds her as the chairman of a small, remote town. Constantly aware that he is not yet capable of the task and troubled by his inexperience, he seeks out solitude and comfort in the open air hot spring. However, Daiki, a potter from the city, relentlessly intrudes on Sawato's territory. Daiki is frivolous, shameless, and infuriating, yet Sawato can't quite bring himself to hate him…
description.pl: Іtоkаwа włаśnіе рrzерrоwаdzіł ѕіę dо dоmu ѕwојеgо zmаrłеgо dzіаdkа. Choć zоѕtаł роіnfоrmоwаnу о tуm, żе роd јеgо nіеоbесnоść ktоś zајął ѕіę dоmеm tо і tаk сzеkа gо nіе lаdа nіеѕроdzіаnkа. Аlе dzіękі tеmu mа ѕzаnѕę роznаć grоnо nіеzwуklе іntеrеѕuјąсусh ludzі.

description.en: Amamiya Hiroto is unlucky. His life consisted of misfortune after misfortune, culminating in an unlucky death during an incident on a school boat trip, trying to save a girl he barely knew. After death, he met a god of reincarnation who requested that the hundred or so dead passengers - one of them being the girl he tried in vain to save - be reincarnated into another world. Yet a series of unfortunate events forced Hiroto to reincarnate with even less luck than before, starting with nothing but a tremendous amount of Mana. His second life, far worse than his first, came to a cruel end. However, upon meeting the god a second time, he was informed that there would be yet another reincarnation, one that had already been set in motion and could not be stopped. Not wanting Hiroto to endure a third life filled with suffering, the god cursed him before he was reborn in the hopes that he would either die quickly or commit suicide. Hiroto was reborn once more as a half-vampire, half-dark elf. A dhampir. Not wanting a fourth life, he is determined to live this third life with the only things remaining from his previous lives - Death Magic and his enormous Mana pool.
description.fa:
امامیا هیروتو یه بدبخته بدشانسه که تو اردو مدرسش به کشتیشون حمله میشه و در راه نجات دختری که حتی نمیشناسش میمیره، بعد مرگش خدا رو میبینه که میخواد تمام کسایی که داخل حادثه ی کشتی مردن رو به یه دنیای دیگه تناسخ کنه
به هرحال بعد کلی بدبختی و بدشانسی اون زندگی دومش رو با مقدار زیادی مانا شروع کرد ولی زندگی دومش حتی بدتر از زندگیه اولش به پایان رسید
به هرحال بعد مرگ دومش دوباره خدارو دید و خدا بهش گفت که زندگیه سومی هم درکاره ولی خدا نمیخواست تو زندگی سومش دوباره بدبختی و زجر رو تحمل کنه برای همین اونو نفرین کرد که یا سریع بمیره یا خودکشی کنه
این دفه هیروتو به عنوان یه دامپیر تناسخ کرد و قصد نداره یه زندگیه چهارم رو تجربه کنه برای همین با چیزایی که از زندگی های قبلیش داره یعنی مانای خیلی زیاد و جادوی مرگ میخواد کارای ناتمومش رو تموم کنه
description.ru:
Главному герою Амамия Хирото не везёт. Его жизнь состоит из цепочки неудач и в конце концов он умирает вследствие несчастного случая на корабле во время школьной экскурсии, погибнув при попытке спасти девушку, которую он едва знал. После смерти он встречает Бога Реинкарнации, которому требуются около ста мертвых пассажиров — среди которых девушка, которую он безуспешно пытался спасти — для перерождения в другом мире. Однако череда несчастливых событий вынуждает Хирото переродиться с ещё меньшей удачей, чем раньше, не имея в начале пути ничего, кроме огромного количества маны. Его вторая жизнь, что была гораздо хуже первой, приводит его к жестокому концу. Несмотря на это, встретившись с Богом в третий раз, он узнает, что будет и третья реинкарнация – она уже запущена и не может быть отменена. Не желая, чтобы Хирото вновь претерпевал жизнь, полную страданий, перед его перерождением Бог проклинает его, в надежде, что Хирото либо умрет быстро, либо совершит самоубийство. На сей раз Хирото переродился как наполовину вампир, наполовину тёмный эльф – дампир. Желая избежать четвёртой реинкарнации, он настроен прожить третью жизнь со способностями, что достались ему от предыдущих – Магией Смерти и Бассейном Маны.  
  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/bravekid0218)
description.es-la:
Amamiya Hiroto tuvo una vida desafortunada. Su vida consistió en desgracia tras desgracia, culminando en una desafortunada muerte durante un incidente en su viaje escolar en barco, al intentar salvar a una chica que apenas conocía. Después de morir, a Hiroto y al centenar de pasajeros muertos se les brindó una propuesta proveniente de un dios de la reencarnación. Así fue como ellos reencarnaron en otro mundo.

Sin embargo, por una serie de desafortunados y extraños acontecimientos, Hiroto fue forzado a reencarnar con muchísima menos suerte de la poca que ya tenía antes, comenzando así su segunda y desafortunada vida, únicamente con una tremenda cantidad de maná, por lo que su segunda vida fue mucho peor que la primera, concluyendo con un cruel final.

A pesar de ello, al encontrarse con ese estúpido dios por segunda vez, se le informó que tendría una tercera vida, que ya había sido puesta en marcha y no era posible evitarla. El dios, al no querer que Hiroto sufriera una tercera vida igual de cruel y llena de sufrimientos que la anterior, lo maldijo antes de que renaciera con la esperanza de que muriera rápidamente o se suicidara.

description.en: Do good or go to hell. The conditions of his new curse seem simple enough for once-hopeful hoodlum Jeonji Kim. Or so it seems when his perky guardian angel shows up on his doorstep one day and heals his limp. But will simply going through the motions of helping people be enough to appease a petty god with a grudge?
description.pl: Bądź dobry lub idź do piekła. Warunki jego nowej klątwy wydają się wystarczająco proste dla niegdyś pełnego nadziei chuligana Jeonjiego Kima. A przynajmniej tak się wydaje, gdy pewnego dnia jego żwawy anioł stróż pojawia się na jego progu i leczy jego utykanie. Czy zwykłe pomaganie ludziom wystarczy, aby udobruchać małostkowego boga miejącego urazę?
description.ru:
Ты был легендой — стал никем,
Как старый лев среди шакалов.
Мечты все обратились в тлен,
Погребены среди завалов.

Увидев слабого, толкни,
Пусть и его жизнь станет адом.
Вот только даже в наши дни
Легенды оживают рядом. © RSC
description.pt-br: Faça o bem ou vá para o inferno. As condições de sua nova maldição parecem simples o suficiente para o outrora esperançoso bandido Kim Jeonji. Ou assim parece quando seu animado anjo da guarda aparece em sua porta um dia e o cura. Mas será que simplesmente fazer o que é necessário para ajudar as pessoas será o suficiente para apaziguar um deus mesquinho com rancor?

The disease forces the person to kiss someone of the opposite sex at regular intervals or die! Yuuta decides that he is going to keep her alive no matter what. Will he succeed? What will the others think when they find out about the two!?

Mimi Nagisa (22 years old) is a former idol. After giving up on her dream of being an idol because of her lacking talent she spends her days working part-time while attending college. However, the moment she meets the idol Ibuki Nanakusa, whom she recently found interest in, their lives begin to cross each other.

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)

[Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/idol2story_info)
description.ja: 才能がないと夢を諦めた元アイドルのミミと、ミミに憧れていた現役アイドル・イブキ。そんな2人が、ひょんな出会いから一緒にサバイバルオーディション番組への出演を目指すことに…!?　一度は諦めかけた夢、今度こそ2人でなら…！
description.ru: Мими Нагиса (22 года) — бывший айдол. После того, как она отказалась от своей мечты стать айдолом из-за отсутствия таланта, она проводит дни работая на неполный рабочий день, учась в колледже. Однако в тот момент, когда она встречает кумира Ибуки Нанакуса, к которому она недавно проявляла интерес, их жизни начинают пересекаться.

A slapstick comedy that involves a town and its neighbors where “pet dogs” have become “humans”!
Feelings that couldn’t be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly…!?
description.fr: Un jour, les chiens de cette ville sont soudainement devenus humains. L'histoire suit la vie de Saki et de son chien Ponta.

description.es-la:
Su hermana siempre dice cosas hirientes y cuyos comportamientos problemáticos nunca cesan, el protagonista, cansado de ella, da un paso adelante con un "plan"
¿Cuál será...?

title.en: They Say There's a Ghost in the Club Room

description.en:
I met a friend who disappeared a few years ago, and it turns out he's now an exorcist?!

Jisang often speaks nonsense or acts dangerously out of nowhere, and sometimes experiences memory lapses. His friend and underclassman, Taeju, shares a concern that he has: When the club members enter the club room, they fall victim to strange phenomena.

Believing it to be the work of a ghost, Taeju calls an occult specialist to resolve the situation. Unexpectedly, the specialist turns out to be Jisang's childhood friend, Ham Leerae.

Jisang then learns that his symptoms weren't due to an illness, but were caused by spiritual possession. Determined to keep Leerae around, Jisang offers his body to assist with exorcism requests.

"That's how I can make you stay. So you can't escape now."

And the solution to free him from possession is...kissing?!
description.ko:
몇 년 전 사라져버린 친구를 다시 만났다. 그것도 퇴마사로..?! 

갑자기 이상한 말을 하거나 위험한 행동을 하면서 기억이 끊기는 증세가 있던 지상.
그에게 친한 대학후배 태주가 고민을 얘기한다. 동아리 회원들이 동아리방에만 오면 이상증세를 보인다는 것. 
귀신이 원인이라고 생각한 태주는 문제해결을 위해 영능력자를 부른다. 
그러나 나타난 영능력자는 뜻밖에 지상의 옛 친구 함이레였는데.. 
지상은 자신의 이상증상이 병이 아니라 빙의 때문임을 알게 되고, 이레를 붙잡아두기 위해 자신의 몸을 이용해 의뢰를 돕기로 한다. 
"그래야 네가 계속 여기 있을 거 아냐. 넌 이제 도망 못 간다는 뜻이지." 
그런데 빙의를 푸는 방법이.. 키스라고...?!
